title: Customized Astral Projection Technique | 6 strategies to facilitate out-of-body experiences
tags: tremor inside the body falling asleep
description:
Learn how to customize your strategy to leave the body. Nanci Trivellato shares her technique to astral travel more easily.  To jump to specific sensations or occurrences that can be used facilitate conscious out-of-body experience, go to:

4:10 - Vibrational state / intense vibrations throughout the body
5:30 - Swaying or rocking sensation
7:15 - Ballooning or swelling sensation
9:30 - Floating sensation
11:15 - Sinking sensation
12:35 - Non-alignment / feeling not aligned with the body
